title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
description: The current behavior observed is that the report design stores an absolute path for the included library. However, we need to save the relative path instead.
OB: Upon inspection, it is noticed that the report design has an absolute path for the included library: <property name="fileName"/E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>.
EB: The expected behavior is that when a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Navigate to the project directory ($project/test) containing the report design.
2. Include a library from the otherlib folder using relative path ($project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary).
